definition: the front piece(s) of a Chinese jacket/lapel
lapel/overlap of Chinese gown/fig. bosom (the seat of emotions)/to cherish (ambition, desires, honorable intentions etc) in one's bosom

sentences.english: '" Then David crept up unnoticed and cut off a corner of Saul's robe.
sentences.chinese: 大卫就起来，悄悄地割下扫罗外袍的衣襟。

sentences.english: The spring breeze lifted the edge of her blouse.
Then David crept up unnoticed and cut off a corner of Saul's robe.
sentences.chinese: 大卫就起来，悄悄地割下扫罗外袍的衣襟。

sentences.english: You are on the coving of the earth.
The oil, then, runs down Aaron's garment.
sentences.chinese: 那膏油接著流到亚伦的衣襟。

sentences.english: Toying with a skirt, you seem to laugh.
sentences.chinese: 摆弄著衣襟，你好像在笑。

sentences.english: Spread the corner of your garment over me, since you are a kinsman-redeemer.
sentences.chinese: 求你用你的衣襟遮盖我，因为你是我一个至近的亲属。

sentences.english: Her filthiness clung to her skirts;
Her filthiness is in her skirts;
See, my father, see the corner of your robe in my hand.
sentences.chinese: 我父啊，看看你外袍的衣襟在我手中。

sentences.english: Look at the rain, messy hair, wet clothes.
sentences.chinese: 看疏雨，凌乱着发鬓，湿了衣襟。

sentences.english: Stops quietly on yours front piece, is feeling your warmth, never leaves.
sentences.chinese: 悄悄停在你的衣襟上，感受着你的温暖，永不离开。

sentences.english: The policeman gripped the wrist of the invisible hand that collared Marvel .
sentences.chinese: 警察抓到了拉住马弗尔衣襟的那只看不见的手。

sentences.english: See, my father, look at this piece of your robe in my hand!
sentences.chinese: 我父阿，看看你外袍的衣襟在我手中。

sentences.english: I cut off the corner of your robe but did not kill you.
sentences.chinese: 我割下你的衣襟，没有杀你。

definition: corner of the lower hem of a jacket etc
to push aside (clothing, curtain etc) to reveal something/to toss aside
collar/neckband/neckline/the place where the two ends of a collar meet
